addValidator(uint256,address).details: Assigns a validator to a project.

createProject(uint256,address,uint256).details: Creates a new project with artist and number of milestones. Callable by the client only (enforced externally).

depositFunds(address,uint256).details: Allows a client to deposit funds for a project and register its parameters.

params._milestoneCount: Number of milestones to split the payment into.

getDispute(uint256).details: Returns dispute details for a project.

getOracle().details: Returns the active oracle (test override takes priority).

getProject(uint256).details: Returns all details of a project.

openDispute(uint256,string).details: Opens a dispute for a given project.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

refundClient(uint256).details: Refunds the client if no milestone has been released.

releaseAfterEvent(uint256).details: Allows anyone (ex: oracle) to release a milestone if the event has ended. The eventEndTimestamps must be set externally (mock or oracle).

releaseMilestone(uint256).details: Releases the next milestone for a project. Incorporates external rules (if enabled) before allowing release.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setProjectConfig(uint256,bool,bool,bool).details: Sets the rule configuration for a project. Only the original client is allowed to change this configuration.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

validateProject(uint256).details: Validates the project, allowing milestone releases.
